# fairys-button



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description | Type                                                                      | Default     |
| ---------- | ---------- | ----------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `block`    | `block`    | 是否为块级元素     | `boolean`                                                                 | `undefined` |
| `dashed`   | `dashed`   | 是否显示        | `boolean`                                                                 | `undefined` |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | 设置按钮禁用      | `boolean`                                                                 | `undefined` |
| `shape`    | `shape`    | 是否显示圆角按钮形状  | `boolean`                                                                 | `undefined` |
| `size`     | `size`     | 设置按钮大小      | `"default" \| "large" \| "small"`                                         | `undefined` |
| `type`     | `type`     | 设置按钮类型      | `"danger" \| "default" \| "primary" \| "success" \| "warning" \| "white"` | `'default'` |
| `variant`  | `variant`  | 按钮形式        | `"border" \| "dashed"`                                                    | `undefined` |
